lead_paragraph: The Financial Front WAR ON MONEY NETWORKS -- President Bush announced an international effort to destroy two financial networks that American officials said had long been suspected of funneling money to members of the Al Qaeda terrorist organization. The announcement came as law enforcement officials in the United States and Europe staged raids to disrupt their operations. A1
